pre-commit-image.description: The Docker image used to run pre-commit :informationsource: You may build your own pre-configured image to speed-up things and prevent the tool and plugins from being pip-installed (see documentation)

pre-commit-args.description: Additionnal arguments for the pre-commit run command

pre-commit-skip.description: pre-commit SKIP environment variable that allows to disable some hooks (see https://pre-commit.com/#temporarily-disabling-hooks)

pre-commit-file.description: pre-commit config file to use for the pre-commit run command
